title: The sicke-mans catechisme, or path-way to felicitie Wherin is contained great variety of sound directions and most sweete co[n]solations collected and contriued into questions and answers, out of the best diuines of our time, by Thomas Draxe minister of Gods Word. Wherevnto is annexed two most comfortable and powrefull prayers.
author: Draxe, Thomas, d. 1618.
publisher: Imprinted [by G. Eld] for Henry Holland, and are to be sold by I. W[right] at Christ Church dore,
